name: Fish Game (Gsnoes)
description:
Disclaimer, This game is really bad.

This game took me like 12 weeks to make, and It's really bad. I am learning, and my next project should be better hopefully. I'm looking into doing a 3d game.

I should note that if you donate any money towards this project you are wasting your money so badly. I appreciate it, but honestly just don't...

There is a secret level in the game, I would love to know if anyone finds it.

Controls:

Space = jump

A & D = movement

Escape = leave level

??? = Secret Level
